subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: On the final day of the N.C.A.A. convention in Grapevine, Tex., the organization’s directors approved 25 proposals in the most sweeping deregulation of the organization’s rule book at a single time.
snippet: On the final day of the N.C.A.A. convention in Grapevine, Tex., the organization’s directors approved 25 proposals in the most sweeping deregulation of the organization’s rule book at a single time.
